db.description: - Delivering food to guest quickly and efficiently\r\n- Communicating clearly with the kitchen and front of house staff
db.requirement: Ability to work well under pressure, be professional, efficient, detail-oriented, and courteous.
db.benefit: - Minimum 8 hours per day (more if needed)\r\n- 1 day off per week
